interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: GUCTOP 8Pcs Makeup Eyelash Brush Eyebrow Comb Review Date: 2020/10/15 Store: GUCTOP Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GUCTOP', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Eyelashes, Eyebrow', 'Material': 'Nylon, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Package Dimensions': '5.7 x 2 x 0.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '779172386785'} Review Text: These brushes are great for a more finished look to your eyebrows. I needed a new one—this package of 8 was an unbelievably low price averaging 87 cents each ($6.99 total for 8 brushes)—so now I have a lot of extras! I wanted a short handled eyebrows brush to fit in my makeup bag—these are only 4 1/4 inches from end to end—long enough to handle comfortably, and short enough to fit. They are exactly what I wanted, and great for travel. They are not the highest quality brushes—one brush has a single bristle out of place, and another has a couple of plastic comb prongs not quite straight—but the price was a bargain, and I have plenty in the pack that are just fine (and the slight issues I mentioned don’t make a difference to that one brush). All in all, I am very happy with this purchase.

I write honest reviews to help others make informed purchases. I do that because I read reviews myself and appreciate how helpful they can be. I hope my review helped you. Review Title: A bargain for basic eyebrow brushes! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls ["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Our formula is free of Parabens and Phthalates. Try Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover today."] {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.4 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} This nail polish remover works well. It doesn’t seem to dry my nails out. I appreciate that it is free of Parabens and Phthalates. But the advertised price is high in comparison to comparable nail polishes. Good nail polish remover. But pricey Bloomy Essentials Organic Eucalyptus Globulus Essential Oil 10 mL - USDA Certified Organic - Natural Aromatherapy for Clear Breathing, Mucus Relief, Nausea Relief and Stress Relief - 100% Pure Bloomy Essentials {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Special Feature': 'Aromatherapy, Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 1.6 x 1.6 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084666', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} I carefully compared this eucalyptus oil to one I already had, and I was surprised to notice a clear difference—this one smells better. I don’t really like the smell of eucalyptus—it’s great for cold relief and in cough drops to help clear your nasal passages, but not just to smell. But this one DOES clearly smell more pure than the one I already had. The other one I was comparing it to is only a couple of months old—so age is not the difference. This does seem to be better quality. I am honestly surprised to be reporting that, because I just didn’t think I would notice a difference.

If my review was helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking “helpful”. Thanks. Better quality and more pure smelling than another one I have GUCTOP 8Pcs Makeup Eyelash Brush Eyebrow Comb GUCTOP {'Brand': 'GUCTOP', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Eyelashes, Eyebrow', 'Material': 'Nylon, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Package Dimensions': '5.7 x 2 x 0.8 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '779172386785'} These brushes are great for a more finished look to your eyebrows. I needed a new one—this package of 8 was an unbelievably low price averaging 87 cents each ($6.99 total for 8 brushes)—so now I have a lot of extras! I wanted a short handled eyebrows brush to fit in my makeup bag—these are only 4 1/4 inches from end to end—long enough to handle comfortably, and short enough to fit. They are exactly what I wanted, and great for travel. They are not the highest quality brushes—one brush has a single bristle out of place, and another has a couple of plastic comb prongs not quite straight—but the price was a bargain, and I have plenty in the pack that are just fine (and the slight issues I mentioned don’t make a difference to that one brush). All in all, I am very happy with this purchase.

I write honest reviews to help others make informed purchases. I do that because I read reviews myself and appreciate how helpful they can be. I hope my review helped you. A bargain for basic eyebrow brushes!
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user continues to prioritize beauty and personal care products, with a focused interest in nail care and an expanding appreciation for makeup tools, particularly eyebrow and eyelash brushes.
- **Key Ingredients:** Values formulations with beneficial ingredients like Vitamin E and Panthenol, alongside pure and organic components, reflecting a commitment to health-conscious choices.
- **Formulation Concerns:** Maintains a preference for products free from harmful chemicals such as Parabens and Phthalates, demonstrating an awareness of health and safety in personal care.
- **Performance Expectations:** Expects high efficacy in products and values quality indicators in essential oils and other beauty tools, emphasizing both functionality and sensory experience.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Remains highly price-sensitive, actively seeking value-for-money solutions, as seen in the recent purchase where affordability was prioritized while still meeting basic quality standards.
- **Rating Behavior:** Generally rates products positively when expectations are met or exceeded. While a recent purchase of makeup brushes exhibited some minor quality issues, the user remained satisfied due to the low price and overall value, typical of their cost-conscious approach.

Overall, this user is health-conscious, values high-quality and effective personal care items, seeks quality tools for beauty applications, and always looks for effective, budget-friendly solutions across their beauty and wellness regimen.
